en_US.project_summary: Spore Protocol infuses digital objects(DOBs) with enduring value backed by tokenomics, redeemable at any time. Ensures true on-chain ownership, privacy, creative freedom and frictionless interaction.

zh_CN.project_summary: Spore 协议为数码物（DOBs）注入了由代币经济支持的持久价值，可以随时取回。确保真正的链上所有权、隐私、创作自由和无摩擦交互。
